inputs.description: -infiles group.*/subj.*/*.results/out.ss_review.*  2. just show label table  gen_ss_review_table.py -showlabs -infiles gr*/sub*/*.res*/out.ss_rev*  ------------------------------------------ terminal options:
inputs.name: INFILES

inputs.description: show the version number  ------------------------------------------ process options:
inputs.name: VER

inputs.description: overwrite the output -tablefile, if it exists  Without this option, an existing -tablefile will not be overwritten.
inputs.name: OVERWRITE

inputs.description: use SEP for the label/vals separator (default = ':')  e.g. -separator : e.g. -separator tab e.g. -separator whitespace  Use this option to specify the separation character or string between the labels and values.
inputs.name: SEPARATOR

inputs.description: display counts of all labels found, with parents  This is mainly to help create a list of labels and parent labels.
inputs.name: SHOWLABS

inputs.description: display all missing keys  Show all missing keys from all infiles.
inputs.name: SHOW_MISSING

inputs.description: write final table to the given file  If the specified file already exists, it will not be overwritten unless the -overwrite option is specified.
inputs.name: TABLEFILE
